alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:58PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Sheridan County through 445 PM MDT... At 357 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rushville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gordon, Rushville, Clinton, Hoover Lake and Mount Maria. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 86 and 105. Highway 250 between mile markers 44 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
